channel.title: Client help!
channel.description: Hello, Since silab client is now done..... I've been working on getting a client for my server..... but thats not the problem, the problem is when i try to run my client it says somthing like ""Java" Not recongnized as an internal or external command." i have the newest jdk... the newest jre (6U13 for jdk and jre) i dont know what to do. help if you can. thanks

item.title: Client help!
item.dc:creator: @Guardianman5 Guardianman5
item.description:
@Guardianman5 wrote:

Yea thats what i meant and i didn’t think so… but it’s still not working… thanks for trying but i’ll just wait until i get a new laptop. thanks guys.

-Guardianman5

Read full topic

item.title: Client help!
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

You have to set your inviormental variables by going to Start->My Computer->View System Info->Advanced-> Environmental Variables. When you open it change your CLASSPATH to “CLASSPATH=#:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;”

And your PATH to “#:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;G:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;.”

PLEASE NOTE in the #'s change it to the disk you saved your Java in.

Read full topic
